Name: Last name
Hiermit stimme ich der Datenschutzerklär: I agree to the privacy policy.
Ich bin an Mitteilungen und Neuigkeiten: I am interested in news and information.
Herzlichen Dank für Ihre Anfrage. Gerne: Thank you very much for your request. We will be happy to make you an offer in the next few days.
Gerne unterbreiten wir Ihnen in den näch: We will be happy to make you an offer in the next few days.
Thank you very much for your request.
Frühstück, eine Auswahl an Getränken aus: Breakfast, a selection of drinks from the minibar, luggage service, valet parking including free parking space, use of WLAN and free access to the Lido alpin Pool & Spa.
Die Ortstaxe in Höhe von 1,60 Euro pro P: The local tax of 1.60 Euro per person and night will be charged separately and can only be paid on site. Children and adolescents up to the age of 14 are exempt from the obligation to pay the local tax.
Für eine Buchung ist eine schriftliche A: A written acceptance of the offer is required for a booking; it is concluded by our written booking confirmation and is fixed by a deposit payment of 50% of the total price (within ten days). Deposit payments can be made by charging the credit card provided (Visa, MasterCard, American Express).
Es besteht kein Rücktrittsrecht im Sinne:
There is no right of withdrawal in accordance with the Consumer Protection Code (notification pursuant to Part III, Title III, Section I of the Consumer Protection Code - GvD 206/2005); nevertheless, the following cancellation conditions are granted: In case of cancellation up to 30 days before arrival, the deposit payment made will be refunded in full; in case of cancellation up to seven days before arrival, the deposit payment made in the amount of 50% of the total arrangement price will be retained; in case of cancellation within the last seven days before arrival, non-arrival or early departure, the total price for the booked arrangement will be charged.

These cancellation conditions apply regardless of any further rental of the cancelled suites.

A cancellation must be made in writing and becomes effective upon written confirmation by the Fine Hotel & Hideaway Berghoferin.

For personal protection, we recommend taking out travel cancellation insurance.
Am Anreisetag steht die reservierte Suit:
On the day of arrival, the reserved suite is available from 3 pm, on the day of departure until 11 am.

For the best possible organisation of evening and night arrivals, we ask for advance notice of arrivals after 8 pm.

Upon request and subject to availability, a late check-out is possible (until 6 pm on the day of departure); for this, 100 Euro per person will be charged.
Als Zahlungsmittel werden Bargeld, Debit: Cash, debit and credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) are accepted as means of payment.
